# Articulations

## Lumbosacral junction

The base of the sacrum articulates with the inferior aspect of the L5 Vertebrae to form the <i>lumbosacral junction</i> [@aptaCurrentConceptsOrthopaedic2024]

## Coccyx

The <i>apex of the sacrum</i> articulates inferiorly with the coccyx [@aptaCurrentConceptsOrthopaedic2024].
